GITHUB_OAUTH_ID.description: The GitHub OAuth client id for being an OAuth consumer

GITHUB_OAUTH_SECRET.description: The GitHub OAuth client secret for being an OAuth consumer

RACK_ENV.description: The rack environment used to differentiate production from staging in rollbar

RAILS_ENV.description: The rails environment used to differentiate production from staging in rollbar

RAILS_SERVE_STATIC_FILES.description: Whether or not rails should serve static assets from the ruby stack

RBNACL_SECRET.description: The secret used for writing encrypted values to the database

ROLLBAR_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Rollbar api token to submit errors

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: The session secret used to encrypt and sign session cookies

SLACK_APP_URL.description: The direct link to your app in the Slack App Store

SLACK_OAUTH_ID.description: The Slack OAuth client id for being an OAuth consumer

SLACK_OAUTH_SECRET.description: The Slack OAuth client secret for being an OAuth consumer

SLACK_SLASH_COMMAND_TOKEN.description: The token from slack to ensure it's a valid incoming request
